code: import React,{useState,useEffect,useContext}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{UserContext}from"./userContext";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"./style/Home.css";import"react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Home=()=>{const{user,setUser}=useContext(UserContext);const[quizes,setQuizes]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const fetchQuizes=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:8082/quizzes");setQuizes(response.data);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching quizes:",error);}};fetchQuizes();},[]);const handleLogout=()=>{setUser(null);localStorage.removeItem("user");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"home-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"home-title",children:"Quiz Titles"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"home-list",children:quizes.map((quiz,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"home-list-items",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/quiz/".concat(quiz.id),children:quiz.title})},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"wrapp-buttons",children:[user&&user.data.user.is_teacher&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/addQuiz",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Home-button",children:"Create Quiz"})}),user&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"Home-button",onClick:handleLogout,children:"Logout"})]})]});};export default Home;
